chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params

Goal:
forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l l' : list A), (forall x : B, In x (map f l') -> In x (map f l)) -> exists l'' : list A, map f l' = map f l'' /\ (forall x : A, In x l'' -> In x l)

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
NoDup_map_injective : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (xs : list A), (forall x y : A, In x xs -> In y xs -> f x = f y -> x = y) -> NoDup xs -> NoDup (map f xs)
NoDup_map_map : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B) (g : A -> C) (xs : list A), (forall x y : A, In x xs -> In y xs -> f x = f y -> g x = g y) -> NoDup (map g xs) -> NoDup (map f xs)
in_map_iff : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) < -> (exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l)
NoDup_Permutation : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), NoDup l -> NoDup l' -> (forall x : A, In x l <-> In x l') -> Permutation l l'
Inductive Permutation (A : Type) : list A -> list A -> Prop := perm_nil : Permutation [] [] | perm_skip : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Permutation l l' -> Permutation (x :: l) (x :: l') | perm_swap : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Permutation (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l) | perm_trans : forall l l' l'' : list A, Permutation l l' -> Permutation l' l'' -> Permutation l l'' Arguments Permutation [A]%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments perm_nil _%type_scope Arguments perm_skip [A]%type_scope _ [l l']%list_scope Arguments perm_swap [A]%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments perm_trans [A]%type_scope [l l' l'']%list_scope
NoDup_map_elim : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (xs : list A) (x y : A), f x = f y -> NoDup (map f xs) -> In x xs -> In y xs -> x = y
map_partition : forall (A B : Type) (p : list B) (l : list A) (x : B) (p' : list B) (f : A -> B), map f l = p ++ x :: p' -> exists (ap : list A) (a : A) (ap' : list A), l = ap ++ a :: ap' /\ map f ap = p /\ f a = x /\ map f ap' = p'
NoDup_Permutation_collate_eq : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (h : A) (f : A -> A -> list B) (l l' : list (A * B)), NoDup (map fst l) -> Permutation l l' -> collate A_eq_dec h f l = collate A_eq_dec h f l'
map_eq_inv_eq : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B), (forall a a' : A, f a = f a' -> a = a') -> forall l l' : list A, map f l = map f l' -> l = l'
map_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l l' : list A), map f (l ++ l') = map f l ++ map f l'
filter_In : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (x : A) (l : list A), In x (filter f l) < -> In x l /\ f x = true
map_ext_in : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> map f l = map g l
in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (x : A), In x l -> In (f x) (map f l)
map_inverses : forall (A B : Type) (la : list A) (lb : list B) (f : A -> B) (g : B -> A), (forall a : A, g (f a) = a) -> (forall b : B, f (g b) = b) -> lb = map f la -> la = map g lb
collate_not_in_eq : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (h' h : A) (f : A -> A -> list B) (l : list (A * B)), ~ In h (map fst l) -> collate A_eq_dec h' f l h' h = f h' h
map_cons : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : A) (l : list A), map f (x :: l) = f x :: map f l
map_map : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B) (g : B -> C) (l : list A), map g (map f l) = map (fun x : A => g (f x)) l
ext_in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = map g l -> forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a
map_eq_inv : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (xs ys : list B), map f l = xs ++ ys -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ l2 /\ map f l1 = xs /\ map f l2 = ys
map_of_map : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B) (g : B -> C) (xs : list A), map g (map f xs) = map (fun x : A => g (f x)) xs
map_of_filterMap : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> option B) (g : B -> C) (l : list A), map g (filterMap f l) = filterMap (fun x : A => match f x with | Some y => Some (g y) | None => None end) l
collate_not_in_rest : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (h h' : A) (l1 l2 : list (A * B)) (f : A -> A -> list B), ~ In h' (map fst l2) -> collate A_eq_dec h f (l1 ++ l2) h h' = collate A_eq_dec h f l1 h h'
collate_not_in : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (h h' : A) (l1 l2 : list (A * B)) (f : A -> A -> list B), ~ In h' (map fst l1) -> collate A_eq_dec h f (l1 ++ l2) h h' = collate A_eq_dec h f l2 h h'
Permutation_in : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (x : A), Permutation l l' -> In x l -> In x l'
collate_not_in_mid : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (h h' : A) (l1 l2 : list (A * B)) (f : A -> A -> list B) (m : B), ~ In h (map fst (l1 ++ l2)) -> collate A_eq_dec h' (update2 A_eq_dec f h' h (f h' h ++ [m])) (l1 ++ l2) = collate A_eq_dec h' f (l1 ++ (h, m) :: l2)
map_ext : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, map f l = map g l
NoDup_remove_all : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l l' : list A), NoDup l' -> NoDup (remove_all A_eq_dec l l')
in_split : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ x :: l2
NoDup_map_filter : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (g : A -> bool) (l : list A), NoDup (map f l) -> NoDup (map f (filter g l))
filterMap = fix filterMap (A B : Type) (f : A -> option B) (l : list A) {struct l} : list B := match l with | [] => [] | x :: xs => match f x with | Some y => y :: filterMap A B f xs | None => filterMap A B f xs end end : forall A B : Type, (A -> option B) -> list A -> list B Arguments filterMap {A B}%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope
